glosses: to condemn, to curse, to maledict

examples.translation: she maledicted him by begging to Sky God

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قرغامق (kargamak), from Old Anatolian Turkish قرغامق (qarġamaq), from Proto-Turkic *karga-, itself a derivation from *karak. Compare Azerbaijani qarğımaq, Crimean Tatar qarğamaq.
